title: Why are Ryze and Morgana still on the champion update schedule?
body: You've already released those updates. Remove them from the schedule.

replies.body: [Right here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202294884-Champion-Update-Schedule#h2)!
That list must be outdated, I don't see Fiddles on it.
Fiddles isnt being worked on?
Not currently, but he needs to be :D.

Not really.

He isn't game breaking or inherently op

He has dedicated mains, a decent winrate and pickrate.

Is considered fun by those who play him.

Is iconic for how trolly his kit is, while not making you feel like "thats broken nothing I could have done"

His kit isn't toxic.

He isn't forced into some weird early game gating due to hit kit itself being broken ({{champion:78}} )

Has clear strengths and weaknesses.

Why would we rework fiddlesticks.
I do think he needs a model update though... Not his animations however, because his awkward stiff movement is part of the character, I feel.

I don't know, I think 75th on the pick rate isn't too decent lol. The completely nerfed lane Fiddles to shit. The reason I think he needs a rework is because of the people that bitch about him to get him nerfed. You know, Zed is allowed to be stupid strong because "lolz Qss", yet Fiddles gets nerfed when Qss countered him about 10x more than Zed, along with the tit ton of other counterplay he had. His own abilities make enemies run away from you, on a champ that you have to be close to do damage. Nerfing everyone of his abilites, including his passive, have made him in a very meh state to play. But, he can't be in a good spot because "omg rito nerf fear cuz it counters my 100% damage build on Tryn so OP".
Any chance of a Brand ability particle update?
Perhaps they haven't scheduled an update for the update schedule.
http://static.ylilauta.org/files/4l/orig/4v9ajmcx/give-that-man-a-slice-of-ukraine.png
{{champion:83}}  love?...
More interestingly, Poppy is listed on the schedule, Ashe isn't, and Ashe got a rework sooner. :( Where's the Poppy love!
Ashe's rework project was quite literally something they could do because they had a bit of time (A week or two?) to relax, and they thought they could give ashe some love.
aktuelly Poppy got the rework sooner, it's just that Ashe is already done, because there wasn't as much to do.
As much as I'm dieing to see the new Poppy VU and GU, I wanna say Ashe was.. Ryze level while Poppy is a little under Sion level.

That list might as well not exist.

A far more detailed one was put onto the PBE a few months ago.

The list of current champions being worked on goes as follows

-Gangplank
-Taric
-Fiora
-Poppy
-Shen
-Urgot
-Yorick

Ashe and Ryze were on that list, they are done.

I would also expect some random smaller reworks to pop up in between those. The Zillean one came out of no where (Which is also incomplete. Still waiting for Zillean to actually be a champion again)
whenever I think about her upcoming update I start hyperventilating. the sooner it comes out the sooner my heart rate will go down
Didn't know they still updated that page

Well... the reason is simple.

The team working on Champion Updates have not told the people running the support page which champs are ready to be listed.
It takes them awhile to update that.
